Address: 256 Scenic Road, Queens Park Highton VIC 3216
Description:
Classic 70s Family home on massive corner block
Driving past, you would never realise that behind the mature trees in the front yard that there is a huge home with 5 bedrooms and 5 seperate living zones including a unique north facing atrium affording expansive uninterupted views towards the North/West. If 70s architectural flare, solid construction and a huge block in a blue chip location are on your wish list then this could be the perfect fit. It is in original well loved condition and is the first time on the market for sale since construction.
Walking through is a voyage of discovery and some of the many features include:
-amazing double storey glass atrium with automatic sun blinds that needs to be seen to be believed
-split level family room with timber lining and double exposed brick
-original timber kitchen with copper range hood and St George oven
-seperate pool/games room approx 8x4m
-internal brick walls, gas heating and alarm system
-upstairs sitting area bathed in sun with amazing views
-large 20 yr old double garage/workshop plus single carport
-orchard and veggie patch in the massive back yard with apricot, fig, orange, lemon and apple trees
-established trees giving extreme privacy from Scenic Rd
This amazing family home has been lovingly cared for and gives the lucky purchaser a multitude of options, either to use as it is, renovate, or subdivide a portion off the back (STCA). Location is excellent with close proximity to Queens Park, quality schools and shops. It is an entertainers dream so if youd like to be the envy of your friends, phone now to book an inspection.
Insights: 29 other 5 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Lovingly Renovated Classic Brick Unit
The Feel:
This classic brick unit has been lovingly renovated, bringing it into modernity with contemporary features for todays lifestyle requirements. Behind the original façade, well thought out updates extend through the kitchen, bathroom and beyond. The stunning gardens provide incredible privacy and offer stunning greenery outlooks from every room and screen the outdoor entertaining spaces. Whether for a down-sizer or young family, this central unit will provide an incredibly convenient lifestyle nearby to all of Leopolds best amenities.
The Facts:
-Fully refurbished throughout including modern bathroom and large kitchen
-5Kw Solar panel system means little or no electricity bills!
-Quality unit with established gardens & alfresco entertaining space
-Practical floorplan with spacious lounge adjoining sunlit dining area
-Updated carpet, tiles, lighting, blinds and ducted heating throughout
-Parking for up to 3 vehicles with 2 separate garage/ workshops plus parking space
-Large kitchen offers SS 900mm oven with gas cooktop and drawer dishwasher
-Modern central bathroom offers large vanity with bath and separate shower
-Cosy formal lounge with in-built speakers, cooling and also has access to alfresco space
-3 bedrooms all offer BIRs with 3rd BR doubling as second living zone if required
-Situated at the rear of the complex increasing privacy and reducing any road noise
-Fantastic location; close to all facilities & easy access to the best of the Bellarine
The Owner Loves
The gardens that surround the entire home give us beautiful outlooks from every window and complete privacy. The location is also fantastic with everything just down the road.

Description:
Quintessential Renovated Beach House
North facing views backing onto Deep Creek reserve this quintessential beach house has been renovated and sits beautifully on a 627m2 allotment in one of Old Torquay's most sought after court locations.
Four bedrooms, enormous lounge/ living, coastal white wash kitchen, dining room and a sensational northerly deck with access to and outlooks to nature.
What we LOVE:
- Polished floor boards
- New carpet throughout
- Freshly painted
- Two modern bathrooms
- Two new split systems
- Ducted gas heating
- Built in robes
- North facing, spacious and very private back yard
- Under house storage
- Carport and second off street parking
- Established gardens
- Secure front fencing and gate
What The VENDOR LOVES:
We have loved our bright beach house with recent renovations throughout. We love the direct access to reserve - perfect for the kids to kick the footy, play cricket or for dog owners to enjoy. It's a short walk into town and just 8min walk to the beach. Close to primary schools and the secondary school. Fantastic for family BBQ's on the deck or sipping a hot morning coffee listening to the birds sing. A fantastic family space in an amazing location.
Insights: First listed on 22 September, this house has been on Domain for 27 days (last updated on 22 September). It was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Wonderful Weatherboard with Plenty of Potential
This spacious weatherboard home presents as the perfect opportunity for those seeking to make their mark in a most progressive and sort after Geelong position. Step inside to a light-filled kitchen, living and dining area which opens to a private, North facing deck and yard. To the rear, a second spacious living room overlooks a secure courtyard, giving you the freedom to enjoy two outdoor areas at your leisure.
Perfectly located between Belmont's vibrant High Street and Highton's Bellevue Ave shops, the home is only a short distance to local primary and secondary schools, and the beautiful Barwon River. Offering huge scope to further improve, the property comprises;
5 good sized bedrooms (4 with robes)
Ensuite and walk in robes to main
Large kitchen with ample storage
2 separate living areas
2 x split system air conditioners plus open fire
Single car garage and off street parking for another
North facing deck/entertaining area
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.
Insights: 83 Shackleton Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2014 and 7 other 5 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Take the first step!
They often say the first step is the hardest, however not in this case. Here is a terrific opportunity to get your foot in the door, on your property journey.
This two-bedroom unit is conveniently located in popular Highton. You have a park and playground straight across the road, around the corner, with a very short walk, you will find the Waurn Ponds shopping centre and Leisure Link sporting hub. It's only a short drive or bike ride to Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, or onto the Melbourne Ring Rd.
The property is ready for you to refresh to your own tastes. Offering north-facing living, two-way bathroom, private courtyard and direct access from the single car garage, this is one you won't want to miss.
Terms: 10% Deposit.
Settlement: 60 days or sooner by agreement.
Text: 9south to 0472 880 610 for further details.

Description:
Beach Retreat With Heart & Soul
The Feel:
Imbued with a lifetime of love & happy memories, this charming home nestled amongst incredible gardens is sure to steal your heart. Be captivated by the wraparound deck that provides sun or shade for entertaining friends, or space for quiet contemplation. 3 beds & 2 bathrooms in the main house are complemented by spacious semi self contained accommodation in the bungalow, so you can open the doors to extra guests or pursue the Airbnb avenue with a unique offering. Oriented to enjoy the north aspect, youll love the advantages of living in this quiet location, central to school, golf & only 8mins flat walk to the main street.
The Facts:
-Exceptional character home on corner allotment embraces the very essence of coastal living
-Families will love this neighbourhood & close proximity to primary school & parks
-Indoor/outdoor lifestyle prioritised, with easy flow to enviable wraparound deck & sitting areas
-Desirable north-facing garden & lawn provides a sun trap
-OP living features a bank of windows, creating a beautiful breezy outlook
-Jindara woodfire heater + brand-new split system in main living area
-U-shaped kitchen with stone benches, cedar servery window & sunny enclosed brekky courtyard
-S/S appliances include gas cooktop, electric oven & DW
-Dining area on split level with custom joinery display shelves
-Master suite enjoys privacy & deck access, with en-suite, ceiling fan & wall-to-wall BIRs
-Queen-size bedroom 2 with BIR + versatile 3rd BR or home office space with boathouse ceiling
-Combined bathroom/laundry w/ shower, vanity, Tastic heater & WC
-DLUG w/ mezzanine storage, fully fenced yard, additional short cut garden gate
-Established, picturesque gardens; olives, ti-tree, strelitzia, grevillea, lavender, succulents & more
-Well-equipped for families, a secure investment property or fabulous holiday retreat - easy lock up & go!
-Everything is within minutes from home, ideal for walking & bike riding
The Owner Loves.
If the walls could talk they would share stories of family, friends & parties... the gate was always open, & we were always entertaining on the front veranda. The bungalow allowed space for everyone to stay over, or host Airbnb guests, with everyone appreciating the gardens & tranquil setting.

Description:
Corner the market! Approved 3 lot subdivision development in Blue Chip Belmont!
Located in a fantastic pocket of increasingly popular Belmont, walking distance to High St amenities, local café scene and local schools, parks and recreational facilities including the fabulous Barwon River. This corner block measuring approximately 920sqm (approx.) currently provides a comfortable 3 bedroom brick home with occupying tenant, provides the perfect opportunity to develop an outstanding unit project in one of Geelongs hottest locations.
The plans allow for three deluxe and separately titled 3 bedroom units on their own title. Each offers two bathrooms, generous open plan spaces and single lock up garaging
The existing home comprises 3 bedrooms, bathroom and double carport with weekly rental return of $330 per week. With the hardwork already done with completion of planning permit and stamped plans this project is ready to unfold!

Description:
Enviable tree top river vista!
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing please contact or Matthew Hunt on 0433 176 611.
Bathed in natural light and providing an unparalleled position and outlook across the Barwon River this stunning location provides the ideal bush like retreat! Well positioned within walking distance to a range of services ensuring that this is the lifestyle central locale you have been seeking.
Consisting of three large bedrooms, master with ensuite, open plan kitchen, dining and lounge leading to entertainer's deck taking full advantage of the views. Features include recently refurbished solar heated pool, carport, brick garden shed, under house storage (possible to be utilised for further accommodation STCA), open fireplace, steam oven, dishwasher and gas ducted heating.
No need for a car here with Belmont Primary, High Street Shops, Barwon River walking tracks all within walking distance. Just a short hop to Geelong CBD, Highton Village, Waurn Ponds Shopping, Aquatic Centre, Deakin University, the Surf Coast and the Ring Road making day to day living a breeze. A truly rare opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
Perfect Townhouse Living in Prime Location!
Positioned on the Waurn Ponds boundary and nestled at the rear for privacy, this beautifully presented townhouse has been designed to take advantage of its low maintenance living and is ready for you to move in and enjoy! Ideally positioned just a short stroll from the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, and nearby to other amenities including the Epworth Hospital, Deakin University, Waurn Ponds Railway Station, Geelong Ring Road and varied coastal routes plus Geelong CBD. This prime property comprises entrance hallway, three spacious bedrooms with built in robes (master with walk in robe), dual access bathroom plus second WC, open plan living at the rear with kitchen overlooking the living and dining room with access to a private, beautifully landscaped courtyard which boasts a fabulous covered entertaining deck area. Other features include polished timber floors, high ceilings, gas central heating, reverse cycle air conditioner, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, ceiling fans, garden shed and a double garage with remote entry. This home is perfect for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor looking for low maintenance living and close to amenities. An inspection will definitely impress!
INSPECTION REQUIREMENTS
MASKS MUST BE WORN AT INSPECTIONS.
Entry may be denied if you are not wearing a mask.
PHOTO ID is required at inspections
Please contact Gina on 0418 594 442 or email ginap@primere.com.au to book an inspection.

Description:
Now, show me that HORIZON.
This modern architectural design, double storey home is low maintenance living at its best. There really is nothing more to do except purchase and enjoy the quality and clever design of this immaculate property. Ideal for those wishing to downsize or secure an excellent home, found in a premium Queens Park/Highton precinct, on allotment of approximately 419m2. Easy access to schools and colleges, Queens Park Golf Course and all within minutes' drive to restaurants and supermarkets.
Comprising 3 bedrooms spacious master with ensuite and WIR, upstairs large open plan kitchen/dining and living area with views of Barrabool Hills, stone bench tops and s/s appliances, downstairs comprises 2nd living area with 2 spacious bedrooms all with built-in robes and cleverly zoned with main bathroom and separate toilet. Other features include remote double lock-up garage, Tasmanian Oak timber floorboards, raked ceiling, ducted heating, 2 * split system, ducted vacuum, double glazed tinted windows and loads of storage.
This fantastic floor plan is sure to impress a range of buyers. An Inspection will certainly impress!!
Currently tenanted for $500 per week

Description:
Dream Home Wanted!
This substantial 915m2 (approx.) allotment located in the heart of Barrabool Hills, offers the ideal lifestyle opportunity. Its generous size and superb location provide the enviable foundations for this premium, highly sought after address.
Nestled among the rolling hills of Highton, just a short 5 minute stroll to the Barrabool Hills Plaza, this allotment is perfectly positioned. Surrounded by beautiful homes and delightful views the north facing aspect of the block provides additional appeal.
The land is close to boutique Highton Village, a gorgeous shopping precinct complete with cafes and retail stores. The tranquility of the Barwon River is just moments away, where the serenity of nature can be embraced, while the endless cycling and walking trails provide the ideal landscape for an active lifestyle.
Further enhancing the location, is the superior selection of some of Geelong's finest schools nearby and close proximity to Deakin University. The education opportunities are covered, so too are the conveniences for work, health and leisure, with direct, easy access to the Epworth Hospital and the Geelong Ring Road for your daily commute to Melbourne or the picturesque Great Ocean Road.
The most desirable offerings of convenience, space and location, combine seemlessly to create an opportunity full of potential to build your dream home.

Description:
A HIDDEN GEM AT AN AFFORDABLE PRICE!!
Privately tucked behind established trees and beautiful gardens, this 3-bedroom home built by local builder PJ Scott Homes is a hidden gem. Filled with plenty of natural light and a lush outlook this near new home is perfect for couples, down-sizers, or investors alike.
The split-level home comprised of a master bedroom with walk in robe and en-suite, second and third bedrooms both with built in robes, rear tinted windows and doors, ducted gas heating throughout and split system to the main hub of the home the living zone. A stylish kitchen finished with stone bench tops and s/s appliances overlook the meals / living area and flow directly out to a lovely outdoor entertaining deck surrounded by well-established plants. Incorporating plantation blinds, powder room, solar hot water, sunny front porch to enjoy your morning cuppa and single remote garage with access from a private rear laneway.
This is great opportunity to secure a well-rounded low maintenance property at affordable price and only moments from local schools, transport links, medical facilities, and surf shop precinct. Call today to arrange your inspection!!

Description:
Saratoga Court-end Sanctuary
The Feel:
Set in a quiet court-end position with vast rural views beyond the villages scenic western boundary, this is tranquility personified. This incredibly well-designed family home is enhanced by a landscape of ancient Moonah Trees in the backyard, with private upper & lower outdoor living truly connected to the sites natural assets. A garden gate leads directly to the Moonah Forest Walk, linking you with the river, Village Park & town within moments. Relaxed coastal living begins the moment you arrive & will appeal to families, downsizers who love to entertain or holiday buyers searching for total serenity.
The Facts:
-Two storey floorplan maximises space, functionality, views & tranquility
-Welcoming tiled entry leads to expansive glazing, framing the rural vista from both levels
-Sunlit kitchen/living/meals hub, plus contemporary splashback window that invites morning sun
-Show-stopping central kitchen with Caesarstone benches, Asko DW & 900mm gas/electric cooker
-Complementary timber veneer & fresh white cabinetry provides ample storage plus WIP
-Seamless connection to treetop deck extends the living & entertaining space
-Living space includes convenient study nook & guest powder room with stunning rural vista
-Commodious Master bedroom is a genuine retreat space, with rural views, WIR & en-suite
-Downstairs, both queen-sized rooms boast BIRs, privacy & sensational outlooks
-Lower lounge flows onto a shaded deck & Moonah grove garden, with productive vegie beds
-Home office abuts the entry + 2 walk-in storage cupboards & a DLUG to complete the floorplan
-Ceiling fans throughout, split system upstairs & zoned ducted heating throughout
-Semi self-contained ground floor attracted holiday rental guests & income
-Close to the Village Park, Barwon River & a pleasant stroll to the shops, beach & school via the garden gate
The Owner Loves.
There is nothing better than relaxing on the treetop deck & watching the sunset over the Moonahs & farmland. Its been a great place to live & attracted popular holiday guests for rental income.
*All information offered by Bellarine Property is provided in good faith. Prospective purchasers are advised to make their own enquiries with respect to the information that is passed on. Bellarine Property will not be liable for any loss resulting from any action or decision by you in reliance on the information.

Description:
Simply Perfect
The one you will want to call your own, spacious, light filled with impressive northern aspects and privately situated with only two on the block is this large two-bedroom unit thats complemented by its comfort and charm.
This perfect abode is conveniently situated in one of Geelongs most blue chip suburbs; location is key and there is no better time to get your foot in the market with the best amenities and public transport at your doorstep.
Offering an immaculate setting while keeping its character and charm, this home impresses with a large functional flowing floor plan, ample storage space, two large bedrooms both offering built in robes, open plan in design and further comforted with split system heating and cooling for all seasons.
The kitchen is spacious, functional and effortlessly flows onto the dining and living zones while a large bathroom, separate toilet and spacious laundry offers ample room for singles or couples alike.
Additional features include a two car garage, north-facing yard thats generous in size to privately entertain family and friends or tinker some time away in the established garden.
A short distance to Highton Village shops, cafes, public transport and only moments away from primary and secondary schools, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Geelong Ring Road and Surf Coast Beaches - this one cant last long!

Description:
Feature-packed family home.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Set on a generous 766m2 allotment, this fantastic property is sure to appeal to those searching for space, privacy, and a family-friendly location.
Comprising 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a study or 4th bedroom, 3 living zones and a stunning backyard with large shed, this property would be ideal for a young family, or tradespeople that require the extra secure storage.
On Entry, the wide hallway and light-filled front living area welcomes you and leads through to the open-plan kitchen living and dining area. To the rear of the home, a large rumpus room adds to the already spacious interior of the home.
The kitchen boasts a 900mm gas cooktop, electric oven, and single drawer dishwasher with a large window overlooking the side yard.
Accommodation is comprised of a large main bedroom with ensuite, walk-in robe, ceiling fan, and beautiful bay window. Two more bedrooms down the hall both offer built-in robes and ceilings fans and are serviced by a convenient central bathroom with separate toilet.
Outside you will find a sunny outdoor entertaining area with built-in sandpit, shade sail, and a large grassed area with secure fencing. Perfect for those with young kids or pets. The fantastic 7x6m shed offers a concrete slab, double roller door, and is accessible through the rear roller door of the garage. The garage is currently set up as a single garage with a dividing wall that houses a craft/sealed storage room. This room could easily be removed and converted back to a double garage.
Notable Features Include:
- Gas Central Heating
- In-ceiling speakers in all living areas
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms and study
The family-friendly location of this property is sure to tick all of your boxes, with the local park at the end of the court, the Bellarine Rail Trail just a short stroll away and all of your daily amenities all within a 5-minute drive including Leopold's Gateway plaza, local community supermarkets, public transport and school bus routes all at arm's reach.
Insights: 6 Fantail Court, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2012 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Pure Potential
** Please note best access to the property is via Moonaree Road **
This conveniently located property boasts a substantial 853m² (approx) allotment plus a solid low maintenance home and is a potential packed opportunity. The brick and tile residence enjoys easy access from a quiet court at the rear and features multiple living zones. Choose from a formal front lounge with ornate ceilings and a feature stone hearth; an open plan area with dining and kitchen; or a large rumpus room at the rear. The generous kitchen has been recently updated and includes 900mm gas cooking, extensive work and storage space and a contemporary finish. Enjoy cosy evenings in front of the log fire in winter, while ducted heating and cooling keep things comfortable too.
There are three bedrooms, (two with built in robes), a family bathroom plus a laundry with a second powder room. Other features include plentiful storage, a sunny northerly aspect and solid timber floors.
Outdoors the site is fully fenced and private with established trees and gardens. A large sheltered deck provides the perfect spot for entertaining and a lock up garage; rainwater storage tank and ample off street parking are also included.
This handy location is right on the doorstep of all the essential amenities, with primary school, public transport, Leopold Memorial Reserve and shopping at the Gateway Plaza just moments away. This is the ideal position to enjoy effortless access to Bellarine beaches, wineries and eateries with Geelong only 15 minutes away too. Investors, developers and first home buyers take note, there are exciting possibilities to be explored here.
Insights: 730 Bellarine Highway, Leopold VIC 3224 was last sold in 2001 and 101 other 3 bedroom house in Leopold have recently been sold.

Description:
Plans & Permits + First Home Buyers/Builders Grants!!
What a timely proposition to consider in conjunction with the Government first home buyer/builder schemes. With all the hard work and timely expense taken care of, all you need to do is appoint your preferred builder to complete the dream!
The approved plan consists of a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom single level townhouse with a double garage and open plan kitchen/dining/living area. With the most minuscule "common" component at the very tip of the entry point leaving you with your very own private title of 358m2. Leaving you to select your own level of fixtures and fittings to ensure this new build fits in with your budget.
Centrally located to all that this growth corridor is known for, Marshall Train Station, AWA Basketball Stadium, local schools and shopping centres, the CBD and Surf Coast plus exceptional access to Deakin University and Epworth Private Hospital.
Alternately, a fantastic investment opportunity taking in the full depreciation benefits of a brand new property with an expected return in the vicinity of $400 per week.
Plans and Contract of Sale available upon request.
Insights: 2C Grove Road, Marshall VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Brand-new, spacious & raring to go!
Youll love:
This spacious home has never been lived in before & features 4 bedrooms, 2 living areas, plus a stunning kitchen with a walk-in pantry, subway tiles & large stone breakfast bar.
The main open plan living zone faces north and opens onto a sheltered alfresco area at the rear, also making it ideal for entertaining.
Additional peace & quiet thanks to the large master bedroom suite with walk-ins & ensuite, plus a second living room thats away from it all.
Other quality inclusions such as high ceilings, ducted central heating & ample storage solutions throughout, plus the split-system heating/cooling in the main living area.
Plus:
3 additional bedrooms with BIRs, a central bathroom, spacious laundry and a double remote garage & great side access.
Landscaped front yard & a sunny, low-maintenance backyard thats suitable for pets & has been planted with privacy in mind & includes exposed aggregate concrete driveway & paths around the whole of the home.
Conveniently located in a quiet & wide street in Quay 2 Estate, only minutes walk away from parks, playgrounds, shops, Torquay Farmers Market & more.
Enjoy extra peace of mind with a 6-month defects period included in the purchase of this newly-built home plus first home buyers are eligible to receive the $20,000 FHOG.
Insights: 10 Cahir Ave, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2020 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.
